patterns: How can i apply at MIU?
How to apply at the univeristy?
I want to know the applying steps?
responses: Through online application using our official website http://www.miuegypt.edu.eg/
online application through MIU official website http://www.miuegypt.edu.eg/

Visit MIU official website http://www.miuegypt.edu.eg/ and press 
 Apply to start your online application process.

patterns: Where is the application on the website?
responses:
you visit our MIU website 
 http://www.miuegypt.edu.eg/
Visit MIU website to apply online (http://www.miuegypt.edu.eg/)

patterns: What are the required fees for the application?
Fees required for application and exam?
responses: A nonrefundable amount of 1350 Egyptian pounds
1350 Egyptian pounds

1350 Egyptian pounds 
 has to be paid by a MasterCard / Visa credit card to book a placement exam

patterns: can i pay by MasterCard / Visa credit card ?
responses: You can pay by MasterCard / Visa credit card
for sure you can pay using your cards (MasterCard / Visa credit card)

patterns: Is the early addmisioon means that i will be accepted
Is the early admission guarantee form me a place in miu
There is a benfeit for early admission
responses:
Doesn't guarantee a place in miu 
 but it ease the admission procedure
Acceptance is also based on the passing the 'MIU' placement exam
This depend on egyptian ministry of Higher educatian and on your high school score

patterns: Can I reschedule the MIU Placement Exam?
Can I change the time of my Exam?
Can I change the day of my Exam?
I can not make it to my exam, can I reschedule it?
responses:
Yes, you can change the exam date using your username and password of your MIU account, 
 which has been sent to you in the confirmation email
Yes you can

patterns: I didn't receive any conformation mail from me!
I haven't receive yet any mail confirming my online application
I did the online application, but I didn't receive any confirmation mail yet!
responses: Please check your spam/bin!

If you are sure that your email is correct that was written in the application form, 
 we can resend the confirmation email in response to an email request to admdocuments@miuegypt.edu.eg

If you are sure that your email is correct that was written in the application form, 
 please call us at 19648

patterns: Can I change my registered email?

responses: Yes, you can change it simply, just send us a request through the Admission Office active email 'admdocuments@miuegypt.edu.eg'
Just simply send us a request through the Admission Office active email 'admdocuments@miuegypt.edu.eg
